g_bAfterburnerDetentClick: Makes the same clicks when the throttle passes the afterburner detent as it does when passing the Idle detent.
g_bEnableExclusiveMouseCapture: Captures the mouse when in 3D so that you don't click something on the desktop when running windowed mode.
g_bMouseButton4TogglesClickablePit: If set, the 4th mouse button (if available) will toggle between mouselook and clickable pit. the wheel is button 3.
g_bMouseWheelKnobs: Allows mouse wheel to turn knobs in 3d pit.
g_fFOVIncrement: Sets how much the field of view should change for each keypress in degrees.
g_fMaximumFOV: Limits the maximum amount that the FOV can be increased.
g_fNarrowFOV: Defines the narrow field of view used by the "Look Closer" view command.
g_nHotasPinkyShiftMagnitude: Enable DirectX Shifting and specify button offset.
